text: @realDonaldTrump Has anyone read a truthful report from the @WhiteHouse about #COVID19 or the Russian Bounty on our military? No, because you don't give a crap about either. #Biden2020 #BountyGate #BountyGateAintGoingAway #TraitorTrump
